General.Name: Macauto Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Macauto Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive products in Taiwan. The company provides automotive interiors, such as engineered fabrics and mesh, trim components, sunshades for roof systems, luggage cover systems, side and rear window sunshades, wind deflectors, net and pull strap assemblies, and mobile phone/tablet holder. It also offers garden tools, including cordless electric mower, electric wheelbarrows, and robotic golf caddy cart. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Yongke 5th Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 710
